version_description:
Added
- Support Dolby Mobile Surround Sound
- Improved Dolby audio decoding performance

Modified
- Fixed crashing issues when playing QuickTime format in iOS 5.x
- Fixed issues with selecting all in list
- Fixed crashing issues when transferring files over 2GB on WiFi
- Fixed other bugs

- Chinese localizing (By Philman)
- Video screen zoom – zoom in and out video screen by pinching gesture
- Download feature enhanced – multi-tasking while downloading and downloading a folder
- Support Animated GIF fie
- Search Bar and Index Bar deactivated by option setting
- Added iTunes Backup option
- Fixed the problem of the playlist of iTunes Movies
- Fixed the abnormal Index Bar showing when activated
- Prohibit a locked folder from moving and deleting
- Fixed the problem of pop noise when activating Dolby Mobile surround mode
- Fixed video and audio sync problem for some files
- Fixed playing performance problem when decoding WMV3, VC1 codecs
- Fixed VobSub rendering problem when playing mp4, m4v
- Fixed other bugs

- Added the option for video zoom gestrue on/off
- Fixed the issue when closing image viewer and the issue of slide show button in iOS 5.x
- Fixed the bug of not remembering the playback time when skip to the next track
- Fixed the bug when adding favorites in SMB folder
- Fixed the other bugs

- Support Symbolic link in FTP
- Fixed the problem of playback failure when streaming or downloading a movie file using SMB
- Fixed the problem of abnormal display of file lists in some SMB servers.
- Fixed the other bugs
- Supports SFTP(SSH File Transfer Protocol)
- Fixed the issue of streaming from HTTP.
- Support Bitcasa

- Support the embedded font for SSA/ASS
- Support Opus codec
- Improved the performance of seeking function when playing a FLAC file
- Improved the performance and the stability
- Fixed the other bugs

- Fixes an issue of player failing when using QuickTime plugin through HTTPS protocol with invalid SSL certificate. 
- Fixes a bug of player shutdown when trying to download/stream a video in the WebBrowser of nPlayer in iPhone.
- Fixes a bug of player shutdown when tyring to login to OneDrive.
- Fixes an issue of battery consumption when playing music as background.
- Fixes other bugs

- Supports Toshiba wireless storage devices (FlashAir, Wireless SSD, Wireless Adapter)
- Fixes a performance issue in iOS 8
- Fixes an issue when connecting to some WebDAV client
- Fixes an issue when downloading video files
- Fixes other bugs

- Supports iPhone 6 / iPhone 6 Plus
- Supports H.264 High profile 10 (Hi10P) hardware decoding (minimum spec: iOS 8 / iPhone 5s, iPad air, iPad mini retina)
- Fixed the crash issue in iOS 5.x
- Download feature in nPlayer browser has been eliminated in the contents streaming sites such as YouTube according to Apple's policy.
- Fixed other bugs

- 改进用户界面
- 支持 UI 主题
- 正式支持 DTS 音频编码 (DTS HD)
- 支持 Dolby、DTS HDMI Bitstream (Passthru)
- 支持 Chromecast
- 支持 智能电视视频投 (UPnP)
- 支持文档文件：PDF、PPT、TXT 等
- 支持图像放大/缩小
- 提高性能和稳定性

* 已添加
- 支持缩略图
- 可选择以随机顺序排序文件
- 可选择显示锁定的文件夹
- 可选择显示专辑文件夹
- 可选择显示 iTunes 文件夹
- 可选择在列表中显示索引条
- 专辑项筛选器：视频、照片和全部
- 按文件夹单个排序选项
- 字幕行间距
- 长按可设置字幕延迟
- 可指定字幕文件夹
- 使用搜索条搜索时可阅览屏幕（仅用于本地视频文件）
- 显示 WiFi 传输状态
- 支持启动器方案：nplayer://

* 已修复
- 修复了连接蓝牙设备时的播放问题
- 修复了保存最近播放位置失败的问题
- 修复了锁定文件夹被解锁的问题
- 修复了文本编码问题
- 修复了快进/快退的问题
- 修复了定向 URL/播放列表时右上角按钮消失的问题
- 修复了弹出窗口尺寸问题
- 修复了当列表太多时从 GoogleDrive 加载文件列表失败的问题
- 修复了在连接 UPnP 期间当列表太多时加载所有文件列表失败的问题
- 修复了使用“时钟”应用时出现“停止播放”的问题
- 修复了按住手势故障问题
- 修复了某些 UPnP 设备连接故障问题（删除现有 UPnP 服务器信息后需要重新注册）)
- 修复了当视频调整尺寸后字幕尺寸未同步的问题
- 修复了视频文件在后台播放时内存泄漏的问题
- 修复了在某些 WebDAV 中检测文件失败的问题
- 修复了其他漏洞。

* Added
·  Improved playback performance (UI/UX)
·  Option to select menu type(Tab Bar, Sliding View)
·  Support PIP (QuickTime format ONLY)
·  Single file repetition
·  Support VoiceOver for subtitles
·  Option to show search box

* Fixed
·  Fixed the issue of DTS bitstream
·  Fixed the issue of playback paused when switching to slim mode while playing with ChromeCast
·  Fixed the issue of resetting playback information after moving or renaming a file
·  Fixed the issue of folder being unlock after moving or renaming a locked folder
·  Fixed the issue of iTunes Backup option error
·  Fixed the issue of OneDrive login problem
·  Fixed the issue of cellular data option not saved
·  Fixed the issue of m3u title displaying problem
·  Fixed the other bugs

- Supports Amazon Cloud Drive
- Supports 3D video mode
- Supports 3D touch (Quick Actions, Peek &Pop)
- Supports .sup, mpl2 and .txt subtitles.
- Highlights the last played item in each folders.
- Localizes Traditional Chinese.
- Improves hardware decoder performance
- Adds the function to save picture, movie files in Documents into Camera Roll
- Adds the function to copy files in iTunes and Album to Documents
- Displays download speed and estimated time to complete
- Displays playing time of movie or music in the list
- Fixes an issue of video stop occasionally while playing
- Fixes an issue of some FLAC files play problem
- Fixes the others
Bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Add option for Deinterlacing
- Add option for icon style
- Add feature to set passcode for network server (support touch ID)
- Fixes the issue of sound problem when playing some mp4 files
- Fixes other bugs

- Fixes an issue when downloading or playing a file via web browser.
- Fixes other bugs.

- Fixes an issue related to hardware decorder.

* Notice : Some issues have been reported in iOS 7 such as the bug in the initial executing stage and in the on-screen display for the information while playback(volume, brightness, ...). The issues are caused by the compatibility problem between Google Noto and iOS 7. We have fixed the issues and strongly advise you of iOS 7 users NOT TO UPDATE the current version until the revised update is available.

- Fixes an issue of on-screen information display bug while playback in iOS 7
- Improved caching speed of SSA/ASS font
Fixes an issue when logging in Windows 10 via SMB.

For the first time in the world, nPlayer supports DTS Headphone:X sound effect. And also playback performance has been enhanced greatly. Enjoy more powerful nPlayer now.

- Supports DTS Headphone:X
- Supports audio equalizer
- Supports Split View (iPad Air 2 / mini 4 / Pro)
- Improves playback performance greatly
- Supports playback in sleep mode when playing via HDMI / AirPlay mirroring (iOS 8 or later)
- Fixes other bugs

[3.3.1]
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.

[3.3.0]
- Supports DTS Headphone:X
- Supports audio equalizer
- Supports Split View (iPad Air 2 / mini 4 / Pro)
- Improves playback performance greatly
- Supports playback in sleep mode when playing via HDMI / AirPlay mirroring (iOS 8 or later)
- Fixes other bugs

- Adds mini player for audio playback.
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Supports iOS 7 UI
- Added deinterlacing
- Added filtering Album list
- Added creating folder of UPnP/DLNA in playing list
- Japanese localizing（by  Yuta Ooka）
- Spanish localizing (by Arturo Fernandez)
- Fixed other bugs

- Adds option for staring with mini player when playing audio file
- Fixes SMB log in problem in OS X (10.11.5)
- Fixes VoiceOver issue
- Fixes other bugs

- Supports FTPS (FTP over SSL)
- Bug fixes and stability improvements
- The title has been changed to ’nPlayer Plus’.
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- Supports Bluetooth keyboard 
- Bug fixes

[Keyboard shortcuts]
Space - Play/Pause
Left/Right Arrow - Fast Backward/Forward
Ctrl + Left/Right Arrow- Previous/Next Track
Up/Down Arrow - Volume
Alt + Up/Down Arrow - Brightness
Ctrl + Up/Down Arrow - Playback Rate
Cmd + Q - Exit

- 支持所有的视频形式(MKV, AVI, MP4等)包括用AirPlay时的H.264视频
- 支持AirPlay的外部字幕
- 支持所有的视频形式(MKV, AVI, MP4等)包括用Chromecast时的H.264视频
- 使用Chromecast时启用更改音轨频道
- 支持所有的视频形式(MKV, AVI, MP4等)包括画中画模式的H.264视频
- 支持画中画模式的外部字幕
- 支持OpenSubtitles
- 添加选项来显示SSA/ASS字幕文本类型
- 修复其他错误

- Bug fixes

- 支持AirPlay的外部字幕

- 使用Chromecast时启用更改音轨频道
- 支持所有的视频形式(MKV, AVI, MP4等)包括画中画模式的H.264视频
- 支持画中画模式的外部字幕
- 支持OpenSubtitles

- 修复其他错误

- Fixes OneDrive login problem
- Minor bug fixes

- 支持AirPlay的外部字幕

- 使用Chromecast时启用更改音轨频道

- 支持画中画模式的外部字幕
- 支持OpenSubtitles
- 添加选项来显示SSA/ASS字幕文本类型
- 修复其他错误
- Bug fixes

- 支持iXpand闪存驱动
- 支持TMDb元数据
- 支持RTMP
- 支持应用程序锁
- 支持分章节
- 修复FTPS的连接问题

- Fixes an crash issue when browsing lists on some UPnP/DLNA servers.

- Supports Google Team Drives

** Amazon has ended support for all third-party apps that use the Amazon Drive API as of August 16, 2019. So Amazon Cloud Drive is no longer supported in this app.
** The minimum version of iOS is now 9.0.

- Adds Dark and Light theme for iOS 13
